items.value:
Ok this is the last time that I'm nervous about my party!
Can you maybe help me again in this regard?

I need:
10x Fortune Cookie

As a thank you, I will give you a toilet for your shelter.
After that I will teach you how to tame animals!
yes i have the Fortune Cookies with me!
i will try to get the Cookies!

As always, I can rely on you!
Take these things as thanks:

1x Toilet (boxed)

Come back if you want a new task!
Now I'll take care of my party :)
thank you Romana and see you soon!

Oh...
and I thought you were done :(
Come back when you have the Fortune Cookies!

And please hurry;)
The birthday party starts soon ..
Ye Ye, i will try my best!
